name: Maintenance
text: Shuffle 2 of the other cards from your hand into your deck in order to draw a card.

effect.text: Shuffle 2 of the other cards from your hand into your deck in order to draw a card.

weaknesses: Net loss of cards in hand
synergies: Combo with cards that benefit from specific deck ordering

competitiveHistory: Maintenance saw limited play due to its card disadvantage. Occasionally used to shuffle back unneeded Evolution cards.

rulings.ruling: You must shuffle exactly 2 other cards from your hand into your deck.
